Description:
Cosy Family Home with Dream Potential
This delightful residence on approximately 720m2 presents all the comforts of home. Boasting four bedrooms, there is ample room for the whole family. Enjoy two living areas; one a cosy lounge room with wood heater and the other a large dining and family room which flows out onto the deck for outdoor entertainment and relaxation. Cherish the moments as you step out into the spacious and low maintenance rear native garden with plenty of room for rest and play.
Beautifully maintained the home is showcased by the richness of slate and hardwood floors throughout the living areas. Carpeted bedrooms include built -in robes and the master bedroom features a two-way bathroom/ensuite. A family bathroom services all the rooms of the home.
A fifth bedroom may double as a home office or study. Just explore your imagination. With a separate entry, the glass French doors open to let fresh air and sunshine in.
The kitchen is at the heart of the home and includes ample storage and a large pantry. An outdoor seating area just off the kitchen is the perfect spot for outdoor creativity and fun or to just take a moment and enjoy a cuppa.
Set amidst a neat front garden the home features ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a single carport and garden sheds for extra storage space. Move straight in and enjoy while you plan for tomorrow and the propertys potential development in this high-density pocket DD03 (S.T.C.A.)
Located in the heart of Ringwood, your next home is close to Eastland Shopping Centre, Costco and other popular shopping precincts delivering the ultimate in lifestyle convenience. Youll enjoy a position within walking distance to local buses and Ringwood Station while also enjoying all the benefits of easy access to the Eastern Freeway. The Mullum Mullum Creek Trail is minutes away for an easy stroll. Zoned for Ringwood Secondary College, other nearby schools include Our Lady of Perpetual Help, Our Mercy and Eastwood Primary Schools, Tintern Grammar, Aquinas College and Norwood Secondary College. Surrounded by reserves and parks there are abundant opportunities to connect with nature and enjoy the great outdoors.
